text_logic_form: The measure of angle $ABC$ is $60$ degrees.
The length of the line $BC$ is $a$.
The length of the line $AC$ is $b$.
The measure of angle $CAB$ is $30$ degrees.
The length of the line $BA$ is $c$.
The line $CA$ is perpendicular to the line $CB$.
